metadata.title: CVE-2014-8567 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The mod_auth_mellon module before 0.8.1 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (Apache HTTP server crash) via a crafted logout requestthat triggers a read of uninitialized data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8567` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-auth-mellon - 0.9.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-mellon package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.1-1').
